songs.title: For You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Find my strength in the bottom of a coffee cup
God knows I just can't give it up, for you
Scream it loud, turn myself inside out
Not even a song will let it out
For you

[Hook]
Can you find it in your heart to let me know?
Can I find it in my heart to let you go?

[Verse 2]
Found relief being taken by the deep blue
But I'd be lying if I said I wasn't thinking of you
I'd bleed it out until I hear you sing it out
Not even a breath will hear me out for you

[Hook]
Can you find it in your heart to let me know?
Can I find it in my heart to let you go?

[Bridge]
My love can't compete
If your heart is complete
My love can't compete
If your heart is complete

[Hook]
Can you find it in your heart to let me know?
Can I find it in my heart to let you go?
Can you find it in your heart to let me know?
Can I find it in my heart to let you go?
Can you find it in your heart to let me know?
Can I find it in my heart to let you go?
